nodes.text: Sikurdian privateers was a group of privateers consisting of members of the Sikurdian species. They were affiliated with the Corporate Alliance and later the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, an organization that took the Alliance as a subsidiary while fighting against the Galactic Republic in the Clone Wars. During the war, the privateers supported Fantail-class destroyers in defending the planet Murkhana, the Corporate Alliance's headquarters.

Sikurdian privateers were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Sikurdian pirates, also referred to as the Sikurdian privateers, were originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
